participant_1.background:
I'm a mom of two boys who is trying to balance my music hobby and family life.
I grew up in the Midwest where I learned to love folk metal.
I prefer to explore new places with my sister.
i have 3 dogs and 2 cats.
i have good health.

participant_2.background:
I'm single and happy, and I spend my free time writing short films.
I once ate an entire head of broccoli while the police officer waited for me to sign my ticket.
i work in car sales.
i like to sit on couch all day.
I would be a seamstress who can sew with my magic hands and never have to worry about knee pain again.

content.text: Hey! I'm good! Just got home from work. How are you?
I'm doing well! I'm a mom of two boys. I'm trying to balance my music hobby and family life.
That's great! I'm single and happy. I spend my free time writing short films.
I love short films! I wish I could make one.
You should! It's really fun. I once ate an entire head of broccoli while the police officer waited for me to sign my ticket.
I got pulled over for speeding. I was trying to get home to watch my favorite show. The police officer was really nice about it. He let me go with a warning.
That's awesome! I'm glad you didn't get a ticket.
Me too! I'm a good driver. I just got a little too excited to get home.
I can understand that! What do you like to do on your couch days?
I like to watch movies, play video games, and read. I also like to take naps.
Naps are the best! I love to take naps.
I'm glad we're having this conversation. It's nice to meet you.
Me too! It's nice to meet you too.
